ops.description: fade({r:0, g:160, b:40, speed:64, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:160, b:40, speed:16, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:0, g:160, b:40, speed:64, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:160, b:40, speed:16, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:200, g:160, b:200, speed:64, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:200, g:160, b:200, speed:16, type:5, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:2}); // {Cloud}
“Everyone all right?
That was rough.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:20}); // {Cloud}
“…Where is the room
with the pictures on the walls?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:23}); // {Cloud}
“No matter what he thinks,
it's going to end here.”{PAUSE}“I'm taking him out!”
fade({r:200, g:160, b:200, speed:64, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:200, g:160, b:200, speed:16, type:5, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:5}); // {Aeris}
“It's full of the knowledge of the Ancients.”{PAUSE}“No…not knowledge
…consciousness…a living soul…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:6}); // {Aeris}
“It's trying to say something.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:7}); // {Aeris}
“I'm sorry, I don't understand.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:11}); // {Aeris}
“…show?
You're going to show me?”
fadeScreen({r:11, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:60}); // unused=0

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:24}); // {Barret}
“You mean WE are, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:25}); // {Tifa}
“We're here too, you know.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:26}); // {Red XIII}
“Don't forget about us!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:19}); // {Cid}
“Hey hey!
Wh, what's the catch?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:30}); // {Cid}
“All right!
Guess you youngsters gotta be enthusiastic
like that!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:28}); // {Yuffie}
“I have nothing to do with it.
But, I guess I'll lend a hand.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:16}); // {Cait Sith}
“…I saw it.
Tseng was in bad shape.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:27}); // {Cait Sith}
“I wonder if he'll go down that easy?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:18}); // {Vincent}
“An illusion the Ancients showed.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:32}); // Cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.
fade({r:0, g:160, b:40, speed:64, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:160, b:40, speed:16, type:5, adjust:255});
